title: Close a Social Services Case
description: A client in a job training program has successfully found employment, and the social worker needs to close their case.

tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker locates the correct case.

tasks.description: Verify that the client has met the goals of their service plan (i.e., gained employment).
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker confirms the successful outcome with the client.

tasks.description: Complete the case closure summary, document the outcome, and officially close the case in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker writes a closing summary and updates the case status to 'Closed-Successful'.
